task.title: How to create locator variables
task.shortdesc: In order to perform an automation test we need locators for the Selenium to perform actions on.

context.p: In this topic we gonna found out how to create locators :

step.cmd: Create a class named after the web page you are on ( every page of the web site must have separte class).
Create a variable as a private of type IWebElement.

result.p: You will learn how to find locators.

taskbody.example: You want to click on a login button. To do that you have to find the locator and perform action on it.
